column5: Who has been, how was the fishing on the main lakes and are there any back lakes you would recommend?
Use the search tab near top right of page

Fished this lake a few years ago. Fishing was not that good. Years ago the fishing was incredible. The lake that you can portage is the better walleye lake. There was another group that hit the eyes one day good in August, but they were shallow.

I've gone to Shannon every year the opening week since 1990 and always done well.The pike fishing is better on the main lake ( Seguin) and the walleye fishing is better on the other big lake (Lenotre). Outpost lake WAHOO has big pike and walleyes. There is a catch and release lake Butel (Rex) that has huge pike and Lake Mix has lake trout that average 20-24 inches.
